divs: Sighting DetailsSITTING OUTSIDE SEEN FLASHING LIGHTS CIRCLING A TOWER WITH FLASHING RED LIGHT LASTED APPROX 45 MIN GOT IN CAR WITH CAMERA AND STARTED IN DIRECTION OF TOWER GOT LOST AND WAS ON A DARK ISOLATED ROAD AND HAD SOME TYPE OF DARK SHODOW SILOTTE FOLLOWING ABOVE CAR GOT HEADACHE HAIRS STOOD UP ON ARMS AND HEAD AND STARTED TO TEAR UP FOR NO REAL REASON GOT VERY NERVOUS BUT AT THE SAME TIME NOT AFRAID FINALLY GOT TO THE TOWER AND SEEN LIGHTS AND TURNED ON CAMERA BUT WOULD NOT RESPOND MY FIANCE STAYED AT HOME AND STILL OBSERVED LIGHTS THERE WAS ATLEAST TWO AND MAYBE THREE.I HAVE FELT VERY ODD EVERY SINCE WITH NO APARRENT REASON.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
